ygData.subject: Re: Hello?  Hello?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... SK to go and hunt?  I have been hunting in HPH and getting good xps, but wondering where to go next.  Also, has anyone *ever* gotten to the point where
ygData.messageBody:
> If anyone out there is getting this, what is a GOOD area for a 20th lvl DE
SK to go and hunt? I have been hunting in HPH and getting good xps, but
wondering where to go next. Also, has anyone *ever* gotten to the point
where they were not KOS to the HP guards?

Good place for a level 20 is doing aviak guards in lakerathe. They'll do you
good all the way to 24. And no, I've always been KOS in HPH. *shrug*

> As an additional aside, I was wondering what the general consensus was on
costs for the following items: Silvery-plated Bracer, Blackened Iron Armor
(any piece or general guideline, like 5plat per AC or what?), BIBS, and Dark
Reaver?

Silvery bracers are good, but under NO circumstances should you wear
blackened iron. That has to be the most overrated armor in Norrath. Oh sure
it may look good, but's the AC of chain and the weight of bronze. The BIBS
is good and should get you through your 20s, pick up your Reaver (and be
saving for one now) right as you hit 30 or thereabouts.

Dravith Vandre'i
50 Dark Elf SK
Fennin Ro
